trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Chino
There were no other sightings in Chino on or around May 12th 2013
divs: sighting detailsit was a very clear night so my family, wife, child, and i went out stargazing with some of our telescopes. we live in chino california about 36 miles east of los angeles so out light pollution and smog doesn't give us the best night sky views, but due to high temperatures and a light breeze the moisture and smog were all but gone and besides fighting the light pollution it was a particularly clear night. great views of the crescent moon, saturn, and jupiter, i am an astronomer with my masters degree in astrophysics, i hold a b.s. degree in aviation science, and a a.s. degree in air traffic control. i am very active in tracking passing satellites, the iss as well as other low earth orbit objects that can readily be seen with the naked eye or a decent pair of binoculars. so after our great night of gazing we packed up and headed for home, after getting all of the gear safely back into the house i stopped for one more to gander at the sky to take in just how amazingly clear the stars were it was 10:28pm, and i noticed two very bright blue\white stars that seemed misplaced around -2 magnitude. they were located near arcturus and were not part of the bo���tis constellation. as i watched them for about 2 min. they dimmed down to about -0.5 magnitude and quickly started in the north eastern direction, their distance apart from each other did not fluxuate and they dimmed and started motion at the exact same time. it took them roughly 3 min. to disappear in the ne horizon. in comparison the iss takes roughly 10 mins to clear horizon to horizon, at 290 miles up and 17,000 mph. these two objects appeared to be higher up than that and moving about 3 times as fast. i use an app on my phone called satellitear which will show very accurate locations of any potentially visible satellites. the two objects in question did not match the locations of any publicly known satellites or iridium flares. i am a man of science and i like logical explanations for things, and this occurrence is above what i can personally classify. i am very interested to see if anyone else saw this occurrence it was rather astonishing to witness. i wish i had my equipment still set up because all my recording devices were packed away in the house at that time. i didn't feel or hear anything outside of the normal region that i live in.
Summary: Two very bright objects, hovering then flying away to the NE in formation.
